Package ProtocolHandler

Interface IOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddItemOperation, AddToCartOperation, AuthenticationOperation, CancelOrderOperation, ComplaintResponseOperation, ConfirmOrderOperation, DeleteAllnewItemFromCartOperation, DeleteItemFromCartOperation, DeleteItemFromNewItemListOperation, DeleteNewItemFromCartOperation, EndOrderOperation, GetAllCustomerOrdersOperation, GetAllCustomersInfoOperation, GetAllEmployeesInfoOperation, GetBranchesOperation, GetBranchOperation, GetCartOperation, GetCatalogOperation, GetComplaintsOperation, GetCustomerInfoOperation, GetItemByIDOperation, GetItemsOfOrderOperation, GetNotificationOperation, GetOrdersByBranchOperation, GetPendingClientOperation, GetReadySurveysOperation, GetReportByBranchOperation, GetReportOperation, GetSurveyHistogramOperation, GetSurveyOperation, GetSurveysNamesOperation, GetUserCurrencyOperation, InsertOrderOperation, LoggedOutOperation, MakeComplaintOperation, PingOperation, RegisterClientOperation, RemoveItemOperation, ResetNewCustomerOperation, SavePDFOperation, SaveSurveyAnswersOperation, SaveSurveyOperation, SendNotificationOperation, SetComplaintAlertedOperation, UpdateAccountAccessOperation, UpdateEmployeeRoleOperation, UpdateItemOperation, UpdateNewItemInCartOperation, UpdateNotificationOperation, UpdateZerliCoinsOperation
    public interface IOperation
    The Interface IOperation is used when designating a new command it has two methods used differently by the Protocol Handler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Perform​(java.lang.String requestee, java.lang.Object data, java.lang.Object params)
      This method is used to Perform an Operation without a response back to the server.
      boolean Perform​(java.lang.String requestee, java.lang.Object data, java.lang.Object params, ResponseWrapper response)
      This method is used to Perform an Operation without a response back to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • Perform

        boolean Perform​(java.lang.String requestee,
                java.lang.Object data,
                java.lang.Object params)
        This method is used to Perform an Operation without a response back to the server.
        Parameters:
        requestee - - holds a unique ID of the requester client
        data - - holds data (in an agreed data type and method) to be used in the Perform
        params - - holds any parameters (in an agreed data type and method) to be used in the Perform
        Returns:
        success - true for PASS and false for FAIL

      • Perform

        boolean Perform​(java.lang.String requestee,
                java.lang.Object data,
                java.lang.Object params,
                ResponseWrapper response)
        This method is used to Perform an Operation without a response back to the server.
        Parameters:
        requestee - - holds a unique ID of the requester client
        data - - holds data (in an agreed data type and method) to be used in the Perform
        params - - holds any parameters (in an agreed data type and method) to be used in the Perform
        response - - use response.SetResponse to set any (agreed) object to return to the client.
        Returns:
        success - true for PASS and false for FAIL
